Virtual Acoustics (VA) C++ API  v2018a
Virtual Acoustics is a real-time auralization framework devoted to Virtual Reality.
  • Main Page
  • Related Pages
  • Namespaces
  • Classes
  • Files
  • File List

31 
35 
36 CVANetNetworkProtocol::CVANetNetworkProtocol()
37  : m_pRealCore( NULL )
38  , m_pServer( NULL )
39  , m_pClient( NULL )
40  , m_pLastAnswerConnection( NULL )
41  , m_pCommandChannel( NULL )
42  , m_pHeadChannel( NULL )
43  , m_oIncomingEvent()
44  , m_vecEventBuffer( 128 )
45  , m_iReceiveTimeout( 0 )
46  , m_iExceptionHandlingMode( IVANetClient::EXC_CLIENT_THROW )
47  , m_bBufferingActive( false )
48  , m_bBufferSynchronisedModification( false )
49  , m_pMessage( NULL )
50  , m_pBufferedMessage( NULL )
51  , m_nCurrentMessageMode( MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER )
52  , m_pEventMessage( NULL )
53 {
54 }
55 
56 CVANetNetworkProtocol::~CVANetNetworkProtocol()
57 {
58  if( m_pLastAnswerConnection )
59  m_pLastAnswerConnection->WaitForSendFinish();
60 
61  delete m_pMessage;
62  delete m_pBufferedMessage;
63 }
64 
65 bool CVANetNetworkProtocol::InitializeAsClient( CVANetClientImpl* pClient, VistaConnectionIP* pCommandChannel, VistaConnectionIP* pHeadChannel, const int iExceptionhandlingmode, const bool bBufferSynchronisedModification )
66 {
67  m_iExceptionHandlingMode = iExceptionhandlingmode;
68  m_bBufferSynchronisedModification = bBufferSynchronisedModification;
69  m_pClient = pClient;
70  m_pCommandChannel = pCommandChannel;
71  m_pHeadChannel = pHeadChannel;
72 
73  m_pMessage = new CVANetMessage( m_pCommandChannel->GetByteorderSwapFlag() );
74  m_pBufferedMessage = new CVANetMessage( m_pCommandChannel->GetByteorderSwapFlag() );
75  m_pEventMessage = new CVANetMessage( m_pCommandChannel->GetByteorderSwapFlag() );
76 
77  SetExceptionHandlingMode( m_iExceptionHandlingMode );
78  return true;
79 }
80 
81 bool CVANetNetworkProtocol::InitializeAsServer( CVANetServerImpl* pServer )
82 {
83  m_pServer = pServer;
84 
85  m_pMessage = new CVANetMessage( VistaSerializingToolset::DOES_NOT_SWAP_MULTIBYTE_VALUES );
86  m_pEventMessage = new CVANetMessage( VistaSerializingToolset::DOES_NOT_SWAP_MULTIBYTE_VALUES );
87  return true;
88 }
89 
90 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::SetExceptionHandlingMode( const int nMode )
91 {
92  m_iExceptionHandlingMode = nMode;
93 }
94 
95 int CVANetNetworkProtocol::GetExceptionHandlingMode() const
96 {
97  return m_iExceptionHandlingMode;
98 }
99 
100 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::SetRealVACore( IVAInterface* pCore )
101 {
102  m_pRealCore = pCore;
103 }
104 
105 #define SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING(ID,FUNCTION) case (ID): { FUNCTION; break; }
106 //#define SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING(ID,FUNCTION) case (ID): { std::cout << "Processing " << #ID << std::endl; FUNCTION; break; }
107 
108 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerCallFunctionByMessageType( const int nMessageType, VistaConnectionIP* pConnection )
109 {
110  switch( nMessageType )
111  {
112  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_VERSION_INFO, ServerGetVersionInfo() );
113 
114  // Base functions
115  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_STATE, ServerGetState() );
116  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_INITIALIZE, ServerInitialize() );
117  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_FINALIZE, ServerFinalize() );
118  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RESET, ServerReset() );
119 
120  // Module interface
121  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_MODULES, ServerGetModules() );
122  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CALL_MODULE, ServerCallModule() );
123  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_SEARCH_PATHS, ServerGetSearchPaths() );
124  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_FIND_FILE_PATH, ServerFindFilePath() );
125  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_CORE_CONFIGURATION, ServerGetCoreConfiguration() );
126  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_HARDWARE_CONFIGURATION, ServerGetHardwareConfiguration() );
127  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_FILE_LIST, ServerGetFileList() );
128 
129  // Event handling
130  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_ATTACH_EVENT_HANDLER, ServerAttachEventHandler( pConnection ) );
131  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_DETACH_EVENT_HANDLER, ServerDetachEventHandler( pConnection ) );
132 
133  // Directivities
134  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CREATE_DIRECTIVITY, ServerCreateDirectivityFromParameters() );
135  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_DELETE_DIRECTIVITY, ServerDeleteDirectivity() );
136  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_DIRECTIVITY_INFO, ServerGetDirectivityInfo() );
137  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_DIRECTIVITY_INFOS, ServerGetDirectivityInfos() );
138  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_DIRECTIVITY_PARAMETERS, ServerGetDirectivityParameters() );
139  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_DIRECTIVITY_PARAMETERS, ServerSetDirectivityParameters() );
140  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_DIRECTIVITY_NAME, ServerGetDirectivityName() );
141  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_DIRECTIVITY_NAME, ServerSetDirectivityName() );
142 
143  // Signal sources
144  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CREATE_SIGNAL_SOURCE_BUFFER_FROM_PARAMETERS, ServerCreateSignalSourceBufferFromParameters() );
145  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CREATE_SIGNAL_SOURCE_TEXT_TO_SPEECH, ServerCreateTextToSpeechSignalSource() );
146  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CREATE_SIGNAL_SOURCE_SEQUENCER, ServerCreateSequencerSignalSource() );
147  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CREATE_SIGNAL_SOURCE_NETWORK_STREAM, ServerCreateNetworkStreamSignalSource() );
148  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CREATE_SIGNAL_SOURCE_ENGINE, ServerCreateEngineSignalSource() );
149  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_CREATE_SIGNAL_SOURCE_MACHINE, ServerCreateSignalSourceMachine() );
150  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_DELETE_SIGNALSOURCE, ServerDeleteSignalSource() );
151  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_SIGNALSOURCE_INFO, ServerGetSignalSourceInfo() );
152  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_SIGNALSOURCE_INFOS, ServerGetSignalSourceInfos() );
153  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_SIGNAL_SOURCE_BUFFER_PLAYBACK_STATE, ServerGetSignalSourceBufferPlaybackState() );
154  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_SIGNAL_SOURCE_BUFFER_PLAYBACK_ACTION, ServerSetSignalSourceBufferPlaybackAction() );
155  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_SIGNAL_SOURCE_BUFFER_PLAYBACK_POSITION, ServerSetAudiofileSignalSourcePlaybackPosition() );
156  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_SIGNAL_SOURCE_BUFFER_LOOPING, ServerSetSignalSourceBufferLooping() );
157  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_SIGNAL_SOURCE_BUFFER_LOOPING, ServerGetSignalSourceBufferLooping() );
158  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_SIGNAL_SOURCE_PARAMETERS, ServerGetSignalSourceParameters() );
159  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_SIGNALSOURCE_PARAMETERS, ServerSetSignalSourceParameters() );
160  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_ADD_SIGNAL_SOURCE_SEQUENCER_SAMPLE, ServerAddSignalSourceSequencerSample() );
161  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_ADD_SIGNAL_SOURCE_SEQUENCER_PLAYBACK, ServerAddSignalSourceSequencerPlayback() );
162  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REMOVE_SIGNAL_SOURCE_SEQUENCER_SAMPLE, ServerRemoveSignalSourceSequencerSample() );

320  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_ACTIVE_SOUND_RECEIVER_EXPLICIT_RENDERER, ServerSetActiveSoundReceiverExplicitRenderer() );
321  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_GET_CORE_CLOCK, ServerGetCoreClock() );
322  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SET_CORE_CLOCK, ServerSetCoreClock() );
323  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_SUBSTITUTE_MACROS, ServerSubstituteMacros() );
324 
325  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_GET_INFOS, ServerGetRenderingModuleInfos() );
326  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_GET_GAIN, ServerGetRenderingModuleGain() );
327  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_SET_GAIN, ServerSetRenderingModuleGain() );
328  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_GET_MUTED, ServerGetRenderingModuleMuted() );
329  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_SET_MUTED, ServerSetRenderingModuleMuted() );
330  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_GET_PARAMETERS, ServerGetRenderingModuleParameters() );
331  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_SET_PARAMETERS, ServerSetRenderingModuleParameters() );
332  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_GET_AURALIZATION_MODE, ServerGetRenderingModuleAuralizationMode() );
333  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_RENDERER_SET_AURALIZATION_MODE, ServerSetRenderingModuleAuralizationMode() );
334 
335  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REPRODUCTION_GET_INFOS, ServerGetReproductionModuleInfos() );
336  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REPRODUCTION_GET_GAIN, ServerGetReproductionModuleGain() );
337  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REPRODUCTION_SET_GAIN, ServerSetReproductionModuleGain() );
338  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REPRODUCTION_GET_MUTED, ServerGetReproductionModuleMuted() );
339  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REPRODUCTION_SET_MUTED, ServerSetReproductionModuleMuted() );
340  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REPRODUCTION_GET_PARAMETERS, ServerGetReproductionModuleParameters() );
341  SERVER_FUNCTION_MAPPING( VA_NP_REPRODUCTION_SET_PARAMETERS, ServerSetReproductionModuleParameters() );
342 
343  case VA_NP_INVALID:
344  default:
345  {
347  std::ostringstream oStream;
348  oStream << "VANetServer: Unkown Message Type " << nMessageType;
349  VA_EXCEPT2( PROTOCOL_ERROR, oStream.str() );
350  }
351  }
352 }
353 
354 bool CVANetNetworkProtocol::ProcessMessageFromClient( VistaConnectionIP* pConnection )
355 {
356  assert( m_pRealCore != NULL );
357 
358  // just to avoid false connection notifies - these can happen
359  if( pConnection->PendingDataSize() == 0 )
360  return true;
361 
362  // Falls wir zuletzt eine Antwort gesendet haben, mssen wir nun warten,
363  // bis das senden abgeschlossen ist, bevor wir die message leeren
364  if( m_pLastAnswerConnection != NULL )
365  m_pLastAnswerConnection->WaitForSendFinish();
366 
367  try
368  {
369  m_pMessage->ResetMessage();
370  m_pMessage->SetConnection( pConnection );
371  m_pMessage->ReadMessage();
372  }
373  catch( VistaExceptionBase& oException )
374  {
375  std::cerr << "VANetNetworkProtocol: caught connection exception - "
376  << oException.GetExceptionText() << std::endl;
377  return false;
378  }
379 
380  int nMessageType = m_pMessage->GetMessageType();
381 
382  // we assume an answer - if an exception occurs, or no answer is
383  // sent, the value will be rewritten
384  m_pMessage->SetAnswerType( VA_NP_SPECIAL_ANSWER );
385 
386  // Es kann eine gebufferete Nachricht kommen.
387  // In dem fall mssen wir mehrfach Befehle parsen
388  // dies tun wir, bis der MessageBuffer leer ist
389  try
390  {
391  if( nMessageType == VA_NP_SPECIAL_BUFFERED_MESSAGE )
392  {
393  while( m_pMessage->GetIncomingMessageSize() > 0 )
394  {
395  nMessageType = m_pMessage->ReadInt();
396  ServerCallFunctionByMessageType( nMessageType, pConnection );
397  }
398  }
399  else if( nMessageType == VA_NP_SPECIAL_CLIENT_EVENT )
400  {
401  int nEventID = m_pMessage->ReadInt();
402  m_pServer->HandleClientEvent( nEventID, pConnection );
403  return true;
404  }
405  else
406  {
407  ServerCallFunctionByMessageType( nMessageType, pConnection );
408  }
409  }
410  catch( CVAException& oException )
411  {
412  if( oException.GetErrorCode() == CVAException::PROTOCOL_ERROR )
413  throw;
414 
415  switch( m_pMessage->GetExceptionMode() )
416  {
417  case IVANetClient::EXC_CLIENT_THROW:
418  {
419  m_pMessage->SetAnswerType( VA_NP_SPECIAL_EXCEPTION );
420  m_pMessage->WriteException( oException );
421  m_pMessage->WriteAnswer();
422  return true;
423  }
424  case IVANetClient::EXC_SERVER_PRINT:
425  {
426  std::cerr << "[IVANetServer]: Caught and swallowed exception :\n"
427  << oException.ToString() << std::endl;
428  return true;
429  }
430  }
431  }
432 
433  if( m_pMessage->GetOutgoingMessageHasData() )
434  {
435  m_pMessage->WriteAnswer();
436  }
437  else if( m_pMessage->GetExceptionMode() == IVANetClient::EXC_CLIENT_THROW )
438  {
439  m_pMessage->SetAnswerType( VA_NP_SPECIAL_NO_EXCEPTION );
440  m_pMessage->WriteAnswer();
441  }
442 
443  return true;
444 }
445 
446 bool CVANetNetworkProtocol::GetBufferSynchronisedModification() const
447 {
448  return m_bBufferSynchronisedModification;
449 }
450 
451 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::SetBufferSynchronisedModifications( const bool bSet )
452 {
453  m_bBufferSynchronisedModification = bSet;
454 }
455 
456 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientPrepareMessageBuffering()
457 {
458  if( m_bBufferSynchronisedModification == false )
459  return;
460 
461  // @todo: how to handle this? ignore, still buffer command, abort?
462  if( m_bBufferingActive == true )
463  return; // we are already buffering
464 
465  m_pBufferedMessage->ResetMessage();
466  m_pBufferedMessage->SetConnection( m_pCommandChannel );
467  m_pBufferedMessage->SetExceptionMode( IVANetClient::EXC_CLIENT_THROW );
468  m_pBufferedMessage->SetMessageType( VA_NP_SPECIAL_BUFFERED_MESSAGE );
469 
470  m_bBufferingActive = true;
471 }
472 
473 int CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientEndMessageBuffering()
474 {
475  assert( m_bBufferingActive );
476 
477  m_bBufferingActive = false;
478 
479  int iRet = -1;
480  try
481  {
482  m_pBufferedMessage->SetExceptionMode( m_iExceptionHandlingMode );
483  m_pBufferedMessage->WriteMessage();
484 
485  m_pBufferedMessage->ReadAnswer();
486  iRet = m_pBufferedMessage->ReadInt();
487  }
488  catch( const VistaExceptionBase& oException )
489  {
490  std::cerr << "VANetNetworkProtocol: caught exception during ClientEndMessageBuffering - "
491  << oException.GetExceptionText() << std::endl;
492  }
493 
494  return iRet;
495 }
496 
497 int CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientProcessEventMessageFromServer( VistaConnectionIP* pConnection, std::list<IVAEventHandler*> liCoreEventHandler )
498 {
499  m_pEventMessage->SetConnection( pConnection );
500 
501  try
502  {
503  m_pEventMessage->ReadMessage();
504 
505  switch( m_pEventMessage->GetMessageType() )
506  {
507  case VA_EVENT_CORE_EVENT:
508  {
509  CVAEvent oEvent = m_pEventMessage->ReadEvent();
510  for( std::list<IVAEventHandler*>::iterator itHandler = liCoreEventHandler.begin(); itHandler != liCoreEventHandler.end(); ++itHandler )
511  {
512  ( *itHandler )->HandleVAEvent( &oEvent );
513  }
514  break;
515  }
516  case VA_EVENT_NET_EVENT:
517  {
518  m_pClient->ProcessNetEvent( m_pEventMessage->ReadInt() );
519  break;
520  }
521  default:
522  {
523  VA_EXCEPT2( PROTOCOL_ERROR, std::string( "Unknown event message type" ) );
524  }
525  }
526  }
527  catch( VistaExceptionBase& oException )
528  {
529  VA_EXCEPT2( PROTOCOL_ERROR,
530  std::string( "VANetNetworkProtocol: caught connection exception - " +
531  oException.GetExceptionText() ) );
532  }
533 
534  return m_pEventMessage->GetMessageType();
535 }
536 
537 
538 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerPrepareEventMessage( const CVAEvent* pEvent,
539  CVANetMessage* pMessage )
540 {
541  pMessage->ResetMessage();
542  pMessage->SetMessageType( VA_EVENT_CORE_EVENT );
543  pMessage->WriteEvent( *pEvent );
544 }
545 
546 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::HandleConnectionClose( VistaConnectionIP* pConnection )
547 {
548  if( m_pLastAnswerConnection == pConnection )
549  m_pLastAnswerConnection = NULL;
550  if( m_pMessage->GetConnection() == pConnection )
551  m_pMessage->ClearConnection();
552 }
553 
554 CVANetMessage* CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetMessage()
555 {
556  return m_pMessage;
557 }
558 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerSendAnswer( CVANetMessage* )
559 {
560  // nothing to do
561 }
562 
563 CVANetMessage* CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientInitMessage( int nCommandId,
564  MESSAGE_MODE eMessageMode )
565 {
566  m_nCurrentMessageMode = eMessageMode;
567  if( eMessageMode == MESSAGE_ALLOWS_BUFFERING && m_bBufferingActive )
568  {
569  m_pBufferedMessage->WriteInt( nCommandId );
570  return m_pBufferedMessage;
571  }
572  else
573  {
574  m_pMessage->ResetMessage();
575  m_pMessage->SetConnection( m_pCommandChannel );
576  m_pMessage->SetMessageType( nCommandId );
577  return m_pMessage;
578  }
579 }
580 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientSendCommand( CVANetMessage* pMessage )
581 {
582  if( pMessage != m_pBufferedMessage )
583  {
584  int nExceptionMode = -1;
585  switch( m_nCurrentMessageMode )
586  {
587  case MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER:
588  case MESSAGE_ENFORCED_EXCEPTION:
589  {
590  nExceptionMode = IVANetClient::EXC_CLIENT_THROW;
591  break;
592  }
593  case MESSAGE_CONDITIONAL_EXCEPTION:
594  case MESSAGE_ALLOWS_BUFFERING:
595  {
596  nExceptionMode = m_iExceptionHandlingMode;
597  break;
598  }
599  }
600 
601  try
602  {
603  pMessage->SetExceptionMode( nExceptionMode );
604  pMessage->WriteMessage();
605 
606  if( m_nCurrentMessageMode == MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER )
607  {
608  pMessage->ReadAnswer();
609  if( pMessage->GetAnswerType() == VA_NP_SPECIAL_EXCEPTION )
610  {
611  throw( pMessage->ReadException() );
612  }
613  else
614  {
615  assert( pMessage->GetAnswerType() == VA_NP_SPECIAL_ANSWER );
616  }
617  }
618  else if( nExceptionMode == IVANetClient::EXC_CLIENT_THROW )
619  {
620  pMessage->ReadAnswer();
621  if( pMessage->GetAnswerType() == VA_NP_SPECIAL_EXCEPTION )
622  {
623  throw( pMessage->ReadException() );
624  }
625  else
626  {
627  assert( pMessage->GetAnswerType() == VA_NP_SPECIAL_NO_EXCEPTION );
628  }
629  }
630  }
631  catch( const VistaExceptionBase& )
632  {
633  //@todo
634  }
635  }
636 }
637 
638 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetVersionInfo( CVAVersionInfo* pVersionInfo )
639 {
640  if( !pVersionInfo ) return;
641  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_VERSION_INFO, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
642  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
643 
644  *pVersionInfo = pMsg->ReadVersionInfo();
645 }
646 
647 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetVersionInfo()
648 {
649  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
650 
651  CVAVersionInfo oVersionInfo;
652  m_pRealCore->GetVersionInfo( &oVersionInfo );
653 
654  pMsg->WriteVersionInfo( oVersionInfo );
655 }
656 
657 int CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetState()
658 {
659  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_STATE, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
660  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
661 
662  return pMsg->ReadInt();
663 }
664 
665 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetState()
666 {
667  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
668  int iState = m_pRealCore->GetState();
669  pMsg->WriteInt( iState );
670 }
671 
672 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientInitialize()
673 {
674  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_INITIALIZE, MESSAGE_ENFORCED_EXCEPTION );
675  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
676 }

679 {
680  m_pRealCore->Initialize();
681 }

683 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientFinalize()
684 {
685  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_FINALIZE, MESSAGE_ENFORCED_EXCEPTION );
686  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
687 }

690 {
691  m_pRealCore->Finalize();
692 }

697  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );

726 
727 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetModules( std::vector<CVAModuleInfo>& m_viModuleInfos )
728 {
729  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_MODULES, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
730  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
731  const int nModules = pMsg->ReadInt();
732  m_viModuleInfos.clear();
733  m_viModuleInfos.resize( nModules );
734  for( int i = 0; i < nModules; i++ )
735  pMsg->ReadModuleInfo( m_viModuleInfos[ i ] );
736 }
737 
738 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetModules()
739 {
740  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
741  std::vector<CVAModuleInfo> viModules;
742  m_pRealCore->GetModules( viModules );
743  pMsg->WriteInt( ( int ) viModules.size() );
744  for( int i = 0; i < ( int ) viModules.size(); i++ )
745  pMsg->WriteModuleInfo( viModules[ i ] );
746 }

751  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
752  CVAStruct oPaths;
753  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oPaths );
754  return oPaths;
755 }

760  const CVAStruct oPaths = m_pRealCore->GetSearchPaths();
761  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oPaths );
762 }

830  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oFileList );

833 CVAStruct CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientCallModule( const std::string& sModuleName, const CVAStruct& oArgs )
834 {
835  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_CALL_MODULE, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
836  pMsg->WriteString( sModuleName );
837  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oArgs );
838  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
839  CVAStruct oReturn;
840  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oReturn );
841  return oReturn;
842 }

845 {

847  std::string sModuleName = pMsg->ReadString();
848  CVAStruct oArgs;
849  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oArgs );
850  CVAStruct oReturn = m_pRealCore->CallModule( sModuleName, oArgs );
851  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oReturn );
852 }

854 int CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientCreateDirectivityFromParameters( const CVAStruct& oParams, const std::string& sName )
855 {
856  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_CREATE_DIRECTIVITY, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
857  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oParams );
858  pMsg->WriteString( sName );
859 
860  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
861 
862  return pMsg->ReadInt();
863 }
864 
865 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerCreateDirectivityFromParameters()
866 {
867  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
868 
869  CVAStruct oParams;
870  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oParams );
871  std::string sName = pMsg->ReadString();
872 
873  const int iDirID = m_pRealCore->CreateDirectivityFromParameters( oParams, sName );
874 
875  pMsg->WriteInt( iDirID );
876 }

884 
885  return pMsg->ReadBool();

893 
894  const bool bRes = m_pRealCore->DeleteDirectivity( iDirID );
895  pMsg->WriteBool( bRes );

901  pMsg->WriteInt( iDirID );

904

920 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetDirectivityInfos( std::vector<CVADirectivityInfo>& vdiDest )
921 {
922  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_DIRECTIVITY_INFOS, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
923  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
924  vdiDest.clear();
925  const int iNumDirectivities = pMsg->ReadInt();
926  for( int i = 0; i < iNumDirectivities; i++ )
927  vdiDest.push_back( pMsg->ReadDirectivityInfo() );
928 }

930 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetDirectivityInfos()
931 {
932  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
933  std::vector<CVADirectivityInfo> vInfos;
934  m_pRealCore->GetDirectivityInfos( vInfos );
935  pMsg->WriteInt( ( int ) vInfos.size() );
936  for( size_t i = 0; i < vInfos.size(); i++ )
937  pMsg->WriteDirectivityInfo( vInfos[ i ] );
938 }

943  pMsg->WriteInt( iID );
944  pMsg->WriteString( sName );
945  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
946 }

953  m_pRealCore->SetDirectivityName( iID, sName );
954 }

956 std::string CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetDirectivityName( const int iID )
957 {
958  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_DIRECTIVITY_NAME, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
959  pMsg->WriteInt( iID );
960  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
961  const std::string sName = pMsg->ReadString();
962  return sName;
963 }
964 
965 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetDirectivityName()
966 {
967  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
968  const int iID = pMsg->ReadInt();
969  const std::string sName = m_pRealCore->GetDirectivityName( iID );
970  pMsg->WriteString( sName );
971 }
972

976  pMsg->WriteInt( iID );
977  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oParams );
978  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
979 }

1179 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetSignalSourceInfos( std::vector<CVASignalSourceInfo>& vssiDest )
1180 {
1181  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_SIGNALSOURCE_INFOS, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
1182  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
1183  vssiDest.clear();
1184  int iNumSignalSources = pMsg->ReadInt();
1185  for( int i = 0; i < iNumSignalSources; i++ )
1186  vssiDest.push_back( pMsg->ReadSignalSourceInfo() );
1187 }

1194  pMsg->WriteInt( ( int ) vInfos.size() );
1195  for( size_t i = 0; i < vInfos.size(); i++ )
1196  pMsg->WriteSignalSourceInfo( vInfos[ i ] );
1197 }

1380 
1381 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientLockUpdate()
1382 {
1383  ClientPrepareMessageBuffering();
1384  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_LOCK_UPDATE, MESSAGE_ALLOWS_BUFFERING );
1385  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
1386 }
1387 
1388 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerLockUpdate()
1389 {
1390  m_pRealCore->LockUpdate();
1391 }
1392 
1393 int CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientUnlockUpdate()
1394 {
1395  if( m_bBufferingActive == false )
1396  {
1397  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_UNLOCK_UPDATE, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
1398  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
1399  return pMsg->ReadInt();
1400  }
1401  else
1402  {
1403  ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_UNLOCK_UPDATE, MESSAGE_ALLOWS_BUFFERING );
1404  return ClientEndMessageBuffering();
1405  }
1406 }
1407 
1408 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerUnlockUpdate()
1409 {
1410  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
1411  int iResult = m_pRealCore->UnlockUpdate();
1412  pMsg->WriteInt( iResult );
1413 }
1414 
1415 bool CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetUpdateLocked()
1416 {
1417  if( m_bBufferingActive )
1418  return true;
1419 
1420  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_UPDATE_LOCKED, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
1421  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
1422  return pMsg->ReadBool();
1423 }
1424 
1425 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetUpdateLocked()
1426 {
1427  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
1428  const bool bResult = m_pRealCore->GetUpdateLocked();
1429  pMsg->WriteBool( bResult );
1430 }
1431 
1432 
1433 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetSoundSourceIDs( std::vector<int>& vSoundSourceIDs )
1434 {
1435  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_SOUND_SOURCE_IDS, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
1436  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
1437  vSoundSourceIDs.clear();
1438  const int iNumElems = pMsg->ReadInt();
1439  for( int i = 0; i < iNumElems; i++ )
1440  vSoundSourceIDs.push_back( pMsg->ReadInt() );
1441 }
1442

1444 {
1445  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
1446  std::vector<int> vIDs;
1447  m_pRealCore->GetSoundSourceIDs( vIDs );
1448  pMsg->WriteInt( ( int ) vIDs.size() );
1449  for( size_t i = 0; i < vIDs.size(); i++ )
1450  pMsg->WriteInt( vIDs[ i ] );
1451 }

1527 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetSoundSourceEnabled()
1528 {
1529  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
1530  const int iID = pMsg->ReadInt();
1531  const bool bEnabled = m_pRealCore->GetSoundSourceEnabled( iID );
1532  pMsg->WriteBool( bEnabled );
1533 }

1629 CVAStruct CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetSoundSourceParameters( const int iID, const CVAStruct& oArgs )
1630 {
1631  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_SOUND_SOURCE_PARAMETERS, MESSAGE_ALLOWS_BUFFERING );
1632  pMsg->WriteInt( iID );
1633  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oArgs );
1634 
1635  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
1636 
1637  CVAStruct oRet;
1638  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oRet );
1639 
1640  return oRet;
1641 
1642 }
1643 
1644 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetSoundSourceParameters()
1645 {
1646  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
1647 
1648  int iID = pMsg->ReadInt();
1649  CVAStruct oArgs;
1650  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oArgs );
1651 
1652  CVAStruct oRet = m_pRealCore->GetSoundSourceParameters( iID, oArgs );
1653 
1654  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oRet );
1655 
1656  return;
1657 }

1982 
1983 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetSoundReceiverIDs( std::vector<int>& vIDs )
1984 {
1985  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_SOUND_RECEIVER_IDS, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
1986  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
1987  vIDs.clear();
1988  const int iNumElems = pMsg->ReadInt();
1989  for( int i = 0; i < iNumElems; i++ )
1990  vIDs.push_back( pMsg->ReadInt() );
1991 }
1992 
1993 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetSoundReceiverIDs()
1994 {
1995  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
1996  std::vector<int> vIDs;
1997  m_pRealCore->GetSoundReceiverIDs( vIDs );
1998  pMsg->WriteInt( ( int ) vIDs.size() );
1999  for( size_t i = 0; i < vIDs.size(); i++ )
2000  pMsg->WriteInt( vIDs[ i ] );
2001 }
2002

2008  return pMsg->ReadInt();
2009 }

2102 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientSetActiveSoundReceiverExplicitRenderer( const int iID, const std::string& sRendererID )
2103 {

2615 
2616 std::string CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientCreateScene( const CVAStruct& oParams, const std::string& sName )
2617 {
2618  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_SCENE_CREATE, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
2619  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oParams );
2620  pMsg->WriteString( sName );
2621  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
2622  return pMsg->ReadString();
2623 }
2624 
2625 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerCreateScene()
2626 {
2627  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
2628  CVAStruct oParams;
2629  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oParams );
2630  const std::string sName = pMsg->ReadString();
2631  const std::string sID = m_pRealCore->CreateScene( oParams, sName );
2632  pMsg->WriteString( sID );
2633 }
2634 
2635 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetSceneIDs( std::vector< std::string >& vsIDs )
2636 {
2637  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_SCENE_IDS, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
2638  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
2639  const int iNumElems = pMsg->ReadInt();
2640  for( int i = 0; i < iNumElems; i++ )
2641  vsIDs.push_back( pMsg->ReadString() );
2642 }
2643 
2644 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetSceneIDs()
2645 {
2646  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
2647  std::vector< std::string > vsIDs;
2648  m_pRealCore->GetSceneIDs( vsIDs );
2649  pMsg->WriteInt( int( vsIDs.size() ) );
2650  for( size_t i = 0; i < vsIDs.size(); i++ )
2651  pMsg->WriteString( vsIDs[ i ] );
2652 }

3167 
3168 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetGeometryMeshIDs()
3169 {
3170  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
3171  std::vector< int > vIDs;
3172  m_pRealCore->GetSoundSourceIDs( vIDs );
3173  pMsg->WriteInt( ( int ) vIDs.size() );
3174  for( size_t i = 0; i < vIDs.size(); i++ )
3175  pMsg->WriteInt( vIDs[ i ] );
3176 }
3177

3592  voRenderer.push_back( pMsg->ReadAudioRenderingModuleInfo() );
3593 }

3731 
3732 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetAcousticMaterialInfo()
3733 {
3734  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
3735  const int iID = pMsg->ReadInt();
3736  CVAAcousticMaterial oMat = m_pRealCore->GetAcousticMaterialInfo( iID );
3737  pMsg->WriteAcousticMaterial( oMat );
3738 }
3739 
3740 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetAcousticMaterialInfos( std::vector< CVAAcousticMaterial >& voInfos )
3741 {
3742  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_ACOUSTIC_MATERIAL_INFOS, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
3743  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
3744  const int iNumMaterials = pMsg->ReadInt();
3745  for( int i = 0; i < iNumMaterials; i++ )
3746  voInfos.push_back( pMsg->ReadAcousticMaterial() );
3747 }
3748 
3749 void CVANetNetworkProtocol::ServerGetAcousticMaterialInfos()
3750 {
3751  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ServerGetMessage();
3752  std::vector< CVAAcousticMaterial > voInfos;
3753  m_pRealCore->GetAcousticMaterialInfos( voInfos );
3754  pMsg->WriteInt( int( voInfos.size() ) );
3755  for( size_t i = 0; i < voInfos.size(); i++ )
3756  pMsg->WriteAcousticMaterial( voInfos[ i ] );
3757 }
3758

3762  pMsg->WriteInt( iID );

3764  return pMsg->ReadString();
3765 }

3791 CVAStruct CVANetNetworkProtocol::ClientGetAcousticMaterialParameters( const int iID, const CVAStruct& oParams )
3792 {
3793  CVANetMessage* pMsg = ClientInitMessage( VA_NP_GET_ACOUSTIC_MATERIAL_PARAMETERS, MESSAGE_WITH_ANSWER );
3794  pMsg->WriteInt( iID );
3795  pMsg->WriteVAStruct( oParams );
3796  ClientSendCommand( pMsg );
3797  CVAStruct oReturn;
3798  pMsg->ReadVAStruct( oReturn );
3799  return oReturn;
3800 }
